>
[Dwarven Doughtiness](/Feats.aspx?ID=1397) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 42 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are either naturally calm and collected in the face of imminent danger, or you are very good at faking it. At the end of your turn, reduce your [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition by 2 instead of 1.
name: Dwarven Doughtiness
